Package game.environments

Class SiteOfLostGrace

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground
game.environments.SiteOfLostGrace
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.capabilities.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.displays.Printable, Interactable, Travelable, Buyable
public class SiteOfLostGrace extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.positions.Ground implements Interactable, Travelable, Buyable
A class that inherits from Ground. The Player can rest here to reset the Game. Implements Interactable as they can be interacted (activated) by the Player, Implements Travelable as they can be used to Fast Travel to other Site of Lost Grace. Implements Buyable as they can be used to upgrade maximum health. Created by:
Version:
1.0
Author:
Bryan Wong Modified by:
